text: ARd4 794 {FMNI 9ieantut Tmq Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 (7av Wart & ToTaNf Aunet4) T41 Fax 91-11.25093507 25093014 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) 0-5 T 6, 0art-10, VA, 78 fvrh-110075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-410075 NHAWPglicy Guidelines[Delegation of Power_to ROs/2017 No 1 124201Z Datedthe 21s December 2017 SeeeeteI Cnea Decision _taken in 327th meeting of_the Executive Committee vide_ Agenda Iten Ng32Z.16 Sub: Delegation of power to ROs for technical finalization and approval of the detailed mates for works of permanent rectification of Ministry indentified black spots reg: Based on traffic accidents data of the years 2011 to 2014, MoRTH has identified 502 black spots on the NHs entrusted with NHAI_ Black spots are locations identified by the Ministry based on recurring accidents/ fatalities and require  immediate rectification measures to stop such occurrences This list of black spots was circulated to all ROs with direction to take necessary rectification measures for mitigation of the black spots on priority. Also, Ministry is in the process of identifying more no. of black spots based on the accidents/ fatalities data of the years 2015 and 2016 which will be in addition to the above. This process is likely to be continued for subsequent years thereafter However so far less than one-third of the black spots have been reported to be rectified during last three years- 2 Therefore, in order to expedite the rectification of the black spots on highest priority basis, it has been decided to delegate the following power to ROs: (i) Regional Officers shall    finalize the mitigation Measures for the   Ministry identified black spots through the available Road Safety expertise with them L.e Road Safety Expert of E/ Road Safety Auditor  prepare the detailed estimates at the PD level based on the available standards/ guidelines; inspect and verify by the RO along with the concerned Road Safety Officer (RSO); approve the estimate, carry out necessary procurement and execute the works costing Rs.50 Crores for each black spot incli all centages; On Cos/ Standalone basis except the works involving land acquisition, under intimation to concerned technical division and Road Safety Cell at HQ (ji All black spots mitigation works involving land acquisition and/ or costing Rs.50 Crores and above shall be submitted to the concerned technical division for approval by the concerned Member with the concurrence 0f Member (F). AIL rectified black   spots shall be   closely monitored by the concerned RO for recurrence Of accidents/ fatalities at the black spot location for 3 period of three after the rectification. (A.K.
